column5: That's the one article I printed off for my archives.   I agree ... great read.

Agree again.  A welcome change from the 'As some of you all know.... but' stuff.  IMO that level of writing has no reason to be published.  Get a mentor already.  Do some reading yourself to see what speaks to you.  JP is a great fisherman because he always has a plan,  and commitment to work that plan.  Thanks to the original wildman for that great article.
Glad ya guys liked it...  I also got this really cool email ... happens whenever I think no ones actually reading this stuff....  --------------------------

That IS a nice email to receive, TJ. Never kid yourself, people are reading the OFC newsletter from the four corners of the earth.....I know a few who are reading in Australia.. JP is one of a kind when it comes to the outdoors. Give yourself a pat on the back for making it happen TJ......ok, ok  pat Monique on the back too then. Great stuff!
Was thinking about JP the other day.Is he on the new board yet? Joe
